title: Bitcoiners perk up as odds of a December Fed rate cut almost double
contentSnippet: Some Bitcoiners are speculating that the significant surge in the odds of a Fed rate cut in December may lead to Bitcoin finding a price “bottom here for now.”

title: Cardano Network Disrupted by 'Poisoned' Transaction Attack
contentSnippet: A validation mismatch sparked an unexpected Cardano network fork as a user publicly apologized for sending the bad transaction.

title: Solo Bitcoin Miner Hits the Jackpot, Winning $266K BTC Reward
contentSnippet: A solo miner earned a Bitcoin bounty for mining the network’s 924,569th block, securing $266,000 worth of the asset against incredible odds.

title: ‘Rich Dad, Poor Dad’ author and Bitcoin bull Robert Kiyosaki sells his BTC
contentSnippet: Kiyosaki disclosed that he sold his Bitcoin at $90,000 after he forecast a $250,000 price target for BTC in 2026 earlier in November.

title: ETH price drops to 4-month low, but Ether futures data hints at $3.2K bounce
contentSnippet: ETH price fell to levels not seen since July, but compelling futures data could shed light on a silver lining. Is Ether headed toward $3,200?

title: Crypto Industry Makes Tax Policy Push With Private Dinner for Lawmakers

title: How low can XRP price go after falling under $2?

title: Bitcoin in a Death Cross: How Low Will We Go?
contentSnippet: Bitcoin is falling, dragging nearly every other crypto asset along with it. The charts suggest this could get uglier.

title: Coinbase ’doubles down’ on Solana with latest DEX acquisition
contentSnippet: The crypto exchange purchased Vector for an undisclosed amount, the latest acquisition by Coinbase in 2025 after Deribit, Echo and others.

title: BTC ETF outflows are 'tactical rebalancing,' not institutional flight: Analysts
contentSnippet: The outflows reflect short-term price movements, not lower institutional demand or structural issues in the Bitcoin market, analysts said.

title: Bitcoin’s death cross confirmation may mean BTC is officially in a bear market
contentSnippet: A rare death cross has been confirmed on Bitcoin’s price chart, suggesting that the bear market has just started. Will dip buyers be able to defy the trend?

title: Anchorage Digital adds HYPE staking support through Figment partnership

title: Here’s what happened in crypto today

title: Bitcoin rout continues as crypto treasuries face reckoning: Finance Redefined
contentSnippet: Growing unrealized losses and falling NAV levels are threatening corporate crypto treasuries, making it difficult to raise capital for future digital asset investments.

title: Grayscale's DOGE, XRP ETFs to Go Live on NYSE Monday

title: BitMine Immersion Sitting on $4B Loss on Ether Bet as Analyst Warns of Structural issues

title: Nvidia's Stellar Quarter Fails to Quell Bears as AI Valuation Fears Deepen on Wall Street

title: UK Operation to Hit Russian Sanctions Evasion Arrests 128, Seizes $32.6M in Crypto and Cash

title: Japanese Bitcoin Treasury Firms Keep Beating BTC. Tax Policy Makes Outperforming U.S. Peers the Easy Part

title: U.S. House Bill Would Allow Federal Taxes in BTC While Aiding U.S. Reserve

title: Fanatics Enters Prediction Markets via Crypto.com Partnership
